name: compare
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

dsense.name: compare
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to examine or look for the difference between two or more things

example.eg: If you compare house prices in the two areas, it's quite amazing how different they are.
example.egtrans: 如果比较一下两个地段的房价，你会惊讶地发现它们的差别竟如此之大。

example.eg: That seems expensive - have you compared prices in other shops?
example.egtrans: 那好像很贵——你有没有比较一下其他店里的价格？

example.eg: Compare some recent work with your older stuff and you'll see how much you've improved.
example.egtrans: 把你近来的作品与以前的对照一下，你就会知道你的进步有多大。

example.eg: This road is quite busy compared to/with ours.
example.egtrans: 与我们那条路相比，这条路很繁忙。

example.eg: Children seem to learn more interesting things compared to/with when we were at school.
example.egtrans: 与我们上学时相比，孩子们现在学的有趣的东西似乎更多一些。

dsense.name: compare
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to judge, suggest, or consider that something is similar or of equal quality to something else
trans_examp.trans_cn: 将…比作；拿…与…相比；认为…和…相似（或不相上下）

example.eg: The poet compares his lover's tongue to a razor blade.
example.egtrans: 诗人把他恋人的舌头比作剃须刀刀片。

example.eg: Still only 25, she has been compared to the greatest dancer of all time.
example.egtrans: 她才25岁就被誉为有史以来最伟大的舞蹈家。

example.eg: People compared her to Elizabeth Taylor.
example.egtrans: 人们把她比作伊丽莎白‧泰勒。

example.eg: You can't compare the two cities - they're totally different.
example.egtrans: 你不能把这两座城市相提并论——它们完全不同。

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: If something or someone does not compare with something or someone else, the second thing is very much better than the first.

example.eg: Instant coffee just doesn't compare with freshly ground coffee.
example.egtrans: 速溶咖啡根本比不上现磨的咖啡。

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: If something compares favourably with something else, it is better than it.

example.eg: The hotel certainly compared favourably with the one we stayed in last year.
example.egtrans: 这家酒店当然比我们去年住的那家要好。

name: compare
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: so good that everyone or everything else is of worse quality
dsense_body_def_block_kk.ddef_b_trans: 无与伦比；无可比拟；举世无双
